item.value: Generate Login code for login user
If user code right - user will be redirected to My offers page If not - will see message “Wrong code”
System parts which will be managed by programmer

Stage 2 If the system has this phone or email - the user will be redirected to “Enter code screen” with “I didn’t receive the code button” which will resend the code. If not - user will get message “Email or phone not found in our system”

Stage 1 Client will enter the login screen and will write his phone or email. After submit - system will write random code to room_search.login_code and client will get code by email or sms. Code will be 6 digits.
After submit - system will write random code to room_search.login_code and client will get code by email or sms.
Client will enter the login screen and will write his phone or email.

Stage 1 Client will enter the login screen and will write his phone or email. After submit - system will write random code to room_search.login_code and client will get code by email or sms. Code will be 6 digits. Stage 2 If the system has this phone or email - the user will be redirected to “Enter code screen” with “I didn’t receive the code button” which will resend the code. If not - user will get message “Email or phone not found in our system” Stage 3 If user code right - user will be redirected to My offers page If not - will see message “Wrong code”
